sentence.Network_en: The youth continued to gawk at her and did not answer.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个年轻人依然傻乎乎地望着她，没有答话。

sentence.Network_en: Tens of thousands came to gawk.
sentence.Network_cn: 成千上万的人赶来看热闹。

sentence.Network_en: Don't gawk at that pretty girl.
sentence.Network_cn: 别呆头呆脑地瞪着那个漂亮小妞.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译... ... gaw 低陷处 gawk 笨人 gawker 傻看的人.
GRE词汇精选（预测词汇） ... gabby 饶舌的 gawk 呆子 Gestapo 盖世太保.

list.abs: gawkinessgawk at 盯住gawp 呆望
Nanny McPhee &amp; The big bang 2010... ... Her Ladyship 夫人 gawk at 呆视 bun 面包.

list.exp: 她呆呆地看着那个男人
list.abs: 她呆呆地望着那婴儿。  She gawked at the man.  她呆呆地看着那个男人。  Penny for your thoughts.  你呆呆地想什么呢。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (as a noun): perhaps related to obsolete gaw 'to gaze', from Old Norse gá 'heed'

entry.def: To gawk at someone or something means to stare at them in a rude, stupid, or unthinking way.

example.ex: The youth continued to gawk at her and did not answer...
example.tran: 那个年轻人依然傻乎乎地望着她，没有答话。

example.ex: Tens of thousands came to gawk.
example.tran: 成千上万的人赶来看热闹。

auth_sentence.content: Great gawk of an ignorant black girl.
auth_sentence.res_content: Great gawk of an ignorant black girl.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Great gawk of an ignorant black girl.

auth_sentence.content: We gawk harmlessly at the self-immolation; it makes us feel better.
auth_sentence.res_content: We gawk harmlessly at the self-immolation; it makes us feel better.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We gawk harmlessly at the self-immolation; it makes us feel better.

auth_sentence.content: There were moments when they would stop and linger to gawk at something but then, like any human couple, they would continue.
auth_sentence.res_content: There were moments when they would stop and linger to gawk at something but then, like any human couple, they would continue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There were moments when they would stop and linger to gawk at something but then, like any human couple, they would continue.
